name: Generic JCL Test for Mainframe Exploits
author: Bigendian Smalls
description:
Provide JCL which can be used to submit
                        a job to JES2 on z/OS which will exit and return 0.  This
                        can be used as a template for other JCL based payloads

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: CreateSession
options.description: Create a new session for every successful login

options.name: InitialAutoRunScript
options.description: An initial script to run on session creation (before AutoRunScript)

options.name: AutoRunScript
options.description: A script to run automatically on session creation.

options.name: CommandShellCleanupCommand
options.description: A command to run before the session is closed

options.name: ACTNUM
options.description: Accounting info for JCL JOB card

options.name: PGMNAME
options.description: Programmer name for JCL JOB card

options.name: JCLASS
options.description: Job Class for JCL JOB card

options.name: NOTIFY
options.description: Notify User for JCL JOB card

options.name: MSGCLASS
options.description: Message Class for JCL JOB card

options.name: MSGLEVEL
options.description: Message Level for JCL JOB card

options.name: JOBNAME
options.description: Job name for JCL JOB card
